anl.verdi.plot.anim

Class PlotAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • anl.verdi.plot.anim.PlotAnimator

  • public class PlotAnimator
extends java.lang.Object
    Animates a plot over a series of time ranges.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlotAnimator(TimeAnimatablePlot plot)
      Creates a PlotAnimtor to animate the specified plot.
      PlotAnimator(TimeAnimatablePlot plot, int width, int height)
      Creates a PlotAnimtor to animate the specified plot.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotAnimator

        public PlotAnimator(TimeAnimatablePlot plot)
        Creates a PlotAnimtor to animate the specified plot. This assumes the plot is currently displayed and the image size will be that of the displayed plot.
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to animate

      • PlotAnimator

        public PlotAnimator(TimeAnimatablePlot plot,
            int width,
            int height)
        Creates a PlotAnimtor to animate the specified plot. The image size is determined by the width and height parameters. The plot need not be displayed.
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to animate
        width - the width of the animated image
        height - the height of the animated image

    • Method Detail

      • addAnimationListener

        public void addAnimationListener(AnimationListener listener)
        Adds an AnimationListener to this PlotAnimator to listen for animation events.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to add

      • start

        public void start(int start,
         int end,
         int delay)
        Starts the animation beginning at the start timestep and ending at the end timestep with the specified delay between frames.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting timestep
        end - the ending timestep
        delay - delay between frames in milliseconds

      • start

        public void start(int start,
         int end,
         java.io.File movieFile,
         java.io.File animatedGifFile,
         java.io.File aviFile)
        Starts the animation beginning at the start timestep and ending at the end timestep. A movie or animated gif of the animated plot will be saved into the specified files, if those files are not null.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting timestep
        end - the ending timestep
        movieFile - if not null, a quicktime movie will be made and saved to this file
        animatedGifFile - if not null, an anmiated gif will be made and saved to this file

      • start

        public void start(int start,
         int end,
         int delay,
         java.io.File movieFile,
         java.io.File animatedGifFile,
         java.io.File aviFile)

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the animation.
